009package imagingbook.common.ij;
010
011import java.awt.Polygon;
012
013import ij.gui.OvalRoi;
014import ij.gui.PointRoi;
015import ij.gui.PolygonRoi;
016import ij.gui.Roi;
017import ij.process.FloatPolygon;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019
020/**
021 * This class defines static ROI-related utility methods
022 * to interface with ImageJ.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 *
026 */
027public class RoiUtils {
028        
029        /**
030         * Retrieves the outline of the specified ROI as an
031         * array of {@link Pnt2d} points with {@code int}
032         * coordinates. Note that unless the ROI is of type
033         * {@link PolygonRoi} or {@link PointRoi} only the corner points of the
034         * bounding box are returned.
035         * Interpolated contour points are returned for a instance of {@link OvalRoi}.
036         * 
037         * @param roi the ROI
038         * @return the ROI's polygon coordinates
039         */
040        public static Pnt2d[] getOutlinePointsInt(Roi roi) {
041                Polygon pgn = roi.getPolygon();
042                Pnt2d[] pts = new Pnt2d[pgn.npoints];
043                for (int i = 0; i < pgn.npoints; i++) {
044                        pts[i] = Pnt2d.PntInt.from(pgn.xpoints[i], pgn.ypoints[i]);
045                }
046                return pts;
047        }
048        
049        /**
050         * Retrieves the outline of the specified ROI as an
051         * array of {@link Pnt2d} points with {@code int}
052         * coordinates. Note that unless the ROI is of type
053         * {@link PolygonRoi} or {@link PointRoi} only the corner points of the
054         * bounding box are returned.
055         * Interpolated contour points are returned for a instance of {@link OvalRoi}.
056         * 
057         * @param roi the ROI
058         * @return the ROI's polygon coordinates
059         */
060        public static Pnt2d[] getOutlinePointsFloat(Roi roi) {
061                FloatPolygon pgn = roi.getFloatPolygon();
062                Pnt2d[] pts = new Pnt2d[pgn.npoints];
063                for (int i = 0; i < pgn.npoints; i++) {
064                        pts[i] = Pnt2d.PntDouble.from(pgn.xpoints[i], pgn.ypoints[i]);
065                }
066                return pts;
067        }
068        
069        public static PointRoi toPointRoi(Pnt2d[] points) {
070                PointRoi roi = new PointRoi();
071                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
072                        roi.addPoint(p.getX(), p.getY());
073                }
074                return roi;
075        }
076        
077}
